Message.Title: fathers disappearing?
Message.Msg: yahoo won't let me post link, but there's a newspaer piece out there about disappearing fathers..and how that contributes to poverty especially among blacks. Interesting how the paper paints this as news. It's been that way for 40 years. It's old news. What's the point now?

Topic.Title: wy were they not happy? (gun owners names published in newspaper)

Message.Msg: Do you have any gold or silver coins in your home? If you do perhaps someone should publish your address. I'm sure "Spike" who just left prison would be glad to know.
Any "male" that deserts his children can't be called a man. More like a stray tom cat.

my observation is that many women expect nothing from their man. If one expects nothing, guess what...one gets nothing. The word "expect" is one of the most powerful words in the English lexicon. That word was very effective for me when raising our kids. Too bad it isn't used more.
